articles.description: Hyderabad: Despite various awareness campaigns 47 people out of 10,000 people in the state are infected by HIV-AIDS. The Telangana State AIDS Control Society is out to raise awareness among the people about this disease in Telangana using auto-rickshaws. Dr G…
